reason: CRITICAL DEPENDENCY ON UNPROVEN NODE 1.3.1: The entire argument of node 1.3.2 depends on the claim that {6j}_q ~ exp(j * Vol_hyp) for fixed real q > 0, q != 1, which is the content of node 1.3.1. However, node 1.3.1 has been challenged at the parent level (challenge ch-1689bb57e79f3f87 on node 1.3): ALL three cited references (Taylor-Woodward 2005, Costantino 2007, Belletti-Yang 2025) work at roots of unity, NOT fixed real q > 0. The exponential asymptotics for fixed real q with spins j -> infinity is an OPEN CONJECTURE, not an established result. Without node 1.3.1, the entire exponential analysis in 1.3.2 collapses — there is no basis for claiming the tetrahedron diagram involves exp(j * Vol_hyp). Node 1.3.2 should declare an explicit dependency on node 1.3.1, and since 1.3.1 is unproven, 1.3.2 inherits that failure. This is not a gap that can be patched — it is a foundational dependency.
